wiki.summary: On “Wants and Needs,” Drake and Lil Baby go back and forth on aspects of life involved in the balance of what is wanted versus what is needed. Between women, money, inner-circles, religion, and more, both rappers have to balance the importance of many things in life. “Wants and Needs” debuted at #2 on the Billboard Hot 100 during the chart week of March 20, 2021. It is Lil Baby’s highest-charting song. Along with “What’s Next” at #1 and “Lemon Pepper Freestyle” at #3 on the chart Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: On “Wants and Needs,” Drake and Lil Baby go back and forth on aspects of life involved in the balance of what is wanted versus what is needed. Between women, money, inner-circles, religion, and more, both rappers have to balance the importance of many things in life. “Wants and Needs” debuted at #2 on the Billboard Hot 100 during the chart week of March 20, 2021. It is Lil Baby’s highest-charting song. Along with “What’s Next” at #1 and “Lemon Pepper Freestyle” at #3 on the chart, Drake debuted all three tracks from Scary Hours 2 in the top three spots on the Billboard Hot 100, becoming the first artist in history to accomplish this feat. He is the third artist in history to occupy all three spots simultaneously, joining Ariana Grande and The Beatles as the only acts to do so. Read more on Last.fm.
